content.question: The first paragraph of the excerpt makes which of the following claims?

choices.label: Emigrants to the Chesapeake came as family groups more often than emigrants to New England did.
The settlers of New England varied in age more than emigrants to the Chesapeake did.
The settlers of both New England and the Chesapeake were disproportionately young adults.
More young adults migrated to New England than to the Chesapeake colonies.

content.answer: The settlers of New England varied in age more than emigrants to the Chesapeake did.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
